Sentencas: In this study, inkjet printing technology was adopted for the application of protective layer coatings on metallic Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) interconnects.
Titulo: Formulation of spinel based inkjet inks for protective layer coatings in SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: The study highlights the potential of the inkjet printing process to fabricate aqueous-based protective layer coatings over ferritic stainless steels, a novel, very flexible, and low-cost approach to coating.
Titulo: Formulation of spinel based inkjet inks for protective layer coatings in SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: The work presented focusses on the formulation of aqueous-based spinel particulate inks for the inkjet printing process using an electro-magnetic inkjet printer.
Titulo: Formulation of spinel based inkjet inks for protective layer coatings in SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: An ink formulation route based on a two-stage ball milling technique was developed to produce a printable ink composition with Manganese Cobalt Oxide (MnCo2O4,MCO) and Manganese Cobalt Ferrite (MnCo1.8Fe0.2O4, MCF) as the coating materials.
Titulo: Formulation of spinel based inkjet inks for protective layer coatings in SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: Stability of the ink suspensions and particle size distribution were studied and characterised using zeta and a particle size analysis, respectively.
Titulo: Formulation of spinel based inkjet inks for protective layer coatings in SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: Flow properties of the inks were analysed using a conventional rheometer at shear rates 1 to 1000 s(-1) and Piezo Axial Vibrator rheometer at higher shear rates (10(-6) s(-1)).
Titulo: Formulation of spinel based inkjet inks for protective layer coatings in SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: Finally, printability of the inks was assessed theoretically based on the Ohnesorge number, Z.
Titulo: Formulation of spinel based inkjet inks for protective layer coatings in SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: The formulated MCO and MCF inks with similar to 25 wt% solid loading exhibited Z values of 4.17 and 6.77, satisfying the printability criteria of the inkjet inks.
Titulo: Formulation of spinel based inkjet inks for protective layer coatings in SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: Printability of the inks was demonstrated by printing them on stainless-steel substrates.
Titulo: Formulation of spinel based inkjet inks for protective layer coatings in SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: and printed layers were free of any visible defects after heat-treatment.
Titulo: Formulation of spinel based inkjet inks for protective layer coatings in SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: The demonstrated ink formulation procedure provides a guide for inkjet inks development with respect to inkjet printer requirements.
Titulo: Formulation of spinel based inkjet inks for protective layer coatings in SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: Furthermore, the outlined methodology can be employed to fabricate protective and other coatings for any kind of metallic components such as bipolar plates and heat-exchangers.
Titulo: Formulation of spinel based inkjet inks for protective layer coatings in SOFC interconnects
